resources.string: Khadamati is a fast, secure, and user-friendly platform that connects users with trusted service providers to simplify daily payments.
Your security is our top priority. At Khadamati, we use best practices to keep your information safe and your transactions protected.

"How we protect you:

" "1. Data Encryption: All your data is encrypted using AES-256 encryption.

" "2. Secure Payments: Every transaction id processed through certain secure gateways.

" "3. Two-Factor Authentication (2DFA): Add an extra layer of protection to your account.

" "4. Real-time Transaction Monitoring: We monitor transactions to detect and prevent suspicious activity.

"

1. We never share your personal information with third parties without your consent.

 2. All payment details are securely stored and tokenized.

 3. You control what data you share and can manage permissions anytime.

"
How much would you rate Khadamati?
Your honest feedback matters a lot!

"Please review and accept our Terms and Conditions before signing up:

" + "1. You must be at least 18 years old and legally eligible to use this app.

" + "2. You are responsible for your account, including all transactions and keeping your credentials secure.

" + "3. Illegal use is strictly prohibited â€” including fraud, money laundering, or unauthorized transfers.

" + "4. Fees may apply for specific transactions, transfers, or account services. These will be disclosed when applicable.

" + "5. We may suspend or terminate your account for policy violations or suspicious activity.
